verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If Jesus is de-vine, we must be de branches
If Jesus is de-vine, we must be de branches
If Jesus is de-vine, we must be de branches
To bear fruit in the kingdom of God

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
If Jesus is de rock - we should be a little boulder
If Jesus is de rock - we should be a little boulder
If Jesus is de rock - we should be a little boulder
To bear fruit in the kingdom of God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
If Jesus is de bread - is your name on the roll now?
If Jesus is de bread - is your name on the roll now?
If Jesus is de bread - is your name on the roll now?
To bear fruit in the kingdom of God
